title: ðŸ¤– Count to 10 with Building Blocks! ðŸ§± Cosmo's Counting Fun for Kids
description: Join Cosmo the friendly blue robot as he builds a colorful tower while counting from 1 to 10! Perfect for toddlers and preschoolers learning numbers. Fun, educational content that makes learning to count exciting with bright building blocks!

scenes.narration: Hi friends! I'm Cosmo! Today we're going to count from 1 all the way to 10 using these amazing colorful blocks! Are you ready to build and count with me?

scenes.spatialLayout: Single block on the ground: RED block
scenes.narration: Let's start! Here's our first block - ONE red block! Can you say ONE? ONE!

scenes.spatialLayout: Tower from bottom to top: 1st block RED, 2nd block ORANGE
scenes.narration: Now I'll add another block on top! Count with me - ONE, TWO! We have TWO blocks! TWO!

scenes.spatialLayout: Tower from bottom to top: 1st block RED, 2nd block ORANGE, 3rd block YELLOW
scenes.narration: Here comes a yellow block! ONE, TWO, THREE! We have THREE blocks now! Can you count THREE? THREE!

scenes.spatialLayout: Tower from bottom to top: 1st block RED, 2nd block ORANGE, 3rd block YELLOW, 4th block GREEN
scenes.narration: A green block joins our tower! Let's count together - ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR! We have FOUR blocks! FOUR!

scenes.spatialLayout: Tower from bottom to top: 1st block RED, 2nd block ORANGE, 3rd block YELLOW, 4th block GREEN, 5th block BLUE
scenes.narration: Here's a beautiful blue block! ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE! Our tower has FIVE blocks! FIVE!

scenes.spatialLayout: Tower from bottom to top: 1st block RED, 2nd block ORANGE, 3rd block YELLOW, 4th block GREEN, 5th block BLUE
scenes.narration: Wow! Look at our colorful tower! We've counted to FIVE! Let's count them all together one more time - ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE! Great job!

scenes.spatialLayout: Tower from bottom to top: 1st block RED, 2nd block ORANGE, 3rd block YELLOW, 4th block GREEN, 5th block BLUE, 6th block PURPLE
scenes.narration: Let's keep building! Here's a purple block! ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, SIX! We have SIX blocks! SIX!

scenes.spatialLayout: Tower from bottom to top: 1st block RED, 2nd block ORANGE, 3rd block YELLOW, 4th block GREEN, 5th block BLUE, 6th block PURPLE, 7th block PINK
scenes.narration: A pink block makes our tower taller! ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, SIX, SEVEN! Count with me - SEVEN! SEVEN!

scenes.spatialLayout: Tower from bottom to top: 1st block RED, 2nd block ORANGE, 3rd block YELLOW, 4th block GREEN, 5th block BLUE, 6th block PURPLE, 7th block PINK, 8th block WHITE
scenes.narration: Here comes a white block! Let's count - ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, SIX, SEVEN, EIGHT! We have EIGHT blocks! EIGHT!

scenes.spatialLayout: Tower from bottom to top: 1st block RED, 2nd block ORANGE, 3rd block YELLOW, 4th block GREEN, 5th block BLUE, 6th block PURPLE, 7th block PINK, 8th block WHITE, 9th block BLACK
scenes.narration: Almost there! A black block joins us! ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, SIX, SEVEN, EIGHT, NINE! That's NINE blocks! NINE!

scenes.spatialLayout: Tower from bottom to top: 1st block RED, 2nd block ORANGE, 3rd block YELLOW, 4th block GREEN, 5th block BLUE, 6th block PURPLE, 7th block PINK, 8th block WHITE, 9th block BLACK, 10th block GOLD
scenes.narration: Here's our final golden block! Let's count our amazing tower - ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, SIX, SEVEN, EIGHT, NINE, TEN! TEN blocks! TEN!

scenes.spatialLayout: Tower from bottom to top: 1st block RED, 2nd block ORANGE, 3rd block YELLOW, 4th block GREEN, 5th block BLUE, 6th block PURPLE, 7th block PINK, 8th block WHITE, 9th block BLACK, 10th block GOLD
scenes.narration: YOU DID IT! We counted all the way to TEN! What an amazing colorful tower we built together! You're such great builders and counters! Don't forget to like this video and subscribe for more counting fun with Cosmo!
